price: 75. Balobi: Etumbu ekozala sé epai ya oyo bokokuta eloko ena (bozali koluka) na mokumba naye, wana nde lifuta lia babubi.
arabic: قَالُواْ جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥ مَن وُجِدَ فِي رَحۡلِهِۦ فَهُوَ جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qālū jazāuhu man wujida fī raḥlihi fahuwa jazāuhu kadhālika najzī al-ẓālimīna
